A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: RJ and Disney have destroyed the Skywalker saga.  The story betrays everything about Luke Skywalker and ruins the remaining OT characters.  The plot is basically a 2.5 hour slo-mo car chase and includes cringeworthy scenes.  Disney flat out tells you they are destroying SW when Luke explains it will not go the way you think and practically murders his nephew\, Yoda telling you the history is worthless\, and Leia saying do not follow me\, follow Poe.  Disney's goal for short term profits has gutted the lifelong fandom that has made this such a profitable series for decades.
